mapper.sql: id, uid, money, type, feature, create_time, update_time, deleted
mapper.select: SELECT t1.money - t2.money FROM (select IFNULL(sum(money),0) as money from user_account where `type` =1 and uid =#{uid} ) t1 , (select IFNULL(sum(money),0) as money from user_account where `type` =-1 and uid =#{uid} ) t2

SELECT count( * )
FROM user_account WHERE uid = #{uid} AND deleted = 0 AND DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%y%m%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( now( ), '%y%m%d' )
